name: Candy Pop Pop
description:
A very addictive elimination game, don't miss it! You tap groups of 3 or more same candies. Tap as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen. Gear up for this addictive and relaxing game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Features:
Very cute graphics.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game, unlimited fun.
It's good for any age.
Mindless fun.
Great way to pass time.

Enjoy!
